panels.description: ~ 1 is good, greater than 2 is not desirable.
panels.title: Cycles per Instruction

panels.description: Important to know SKU, compare Frequency of SKU against run rate.
panels.title: Average CPU Frequency

panels.description: If anything beyond 10% in metric cpu utilization in kernel need to investigate.
panels.title: CPU Utilization in Kernel

metrics.field: metric_Average LLC data read miss latency (in ns)

panels.description: CUPS is a representation of aggregate physical utilization of the three fundamental compute resources within a server platform, viz. the processor, memory and IO subsystems, respectively. CUPS is expressed as a percentage of maximum compute headroom (in resource usage per second) for a given power and thermal budget.
panels.title: CUPs Index
